program: Master of Science in Computer Science (MS)

sections.text: Yale’s MS in Computer Science provides advanced training in core and specialized areas of computing, preparing students for technical careers or further doctoral study.

items: Graduate‑level coursework across algorithms, systems, AI, and theory
Opportunities to take courses across Yale
sections.text: Students complete graduate‑level CS courses with flexibility to focus on subfields such as AI, systems, and theory, alongside cross‑disciplinary opportunities.
